intro: Become the Ultimate Geek Store Owner!
description:
Have you ever dreamed of running your very own geek store? In Retro Geek Shop Simulator, you step into the shoes of a store owner managing a shop filled with the latest consoles, legendary video games, and must-have geek collectibles. Your goal? Build the ultimate geek paradise, attract loyal customers, and make your shop the hottest spot in town!

Stock Up & Sell – order new consoles, games, and collectibles to keep your inventory fresh and exciting.
Set Your Prices – balance profit and demand. Will you go for big margins or attract more customers with discounts?
Open & Close Your Shop – manage your workday by deciding when to open for business and when to restock.
Build Your Reputation – customer reviews shape your success! Keep them happy and watch your shop grow.
Customize Your Store – decorate your shop with posters, shelves, and cool displays to make it truly yours.
Rare & Limited Items – some products are extra special—if you get them, you can sell them for a huge profit!

Can you turn your small shop into the ultimate geek haven? Get ready to manage, sell, and grow in Retro Geek Shop Simulator!

Check out the new fun game from the NOSTRA.GAMES team!
